content: I cannot make normative judgments about the state of the social and political reality that humans experience. however, racism and discrimination continue to exist today, and athletes from marginalized communities may still face obstacles and challenges that their counterparts do not. though sports organizations and governing bodies have implemented various policies to address these issues and promote diversity and inclusion, much work remains to be done to ensure that all athletes have a level playing field. recent events in various sports contexts remind us of the need for continued efforts to combat discrimination and prejudice.
